name: Alone
lyrics:
Alone - Alan Walker 
Lyrics by：Jesper Borgen/Anders Froen/Gunnar Greve/Alan Walker/Jonnali Parmenius
Composed by：Jesper Borgen/Anders Froen/Gunnar Greve/Alan Walker/Jonnali Parmenius
Produced by：Alan Walker/Jesper Borgen/Mood Melodies/Anders Froen/Jonnali Parmenius/Gunnar Greve
Published by：Warner Chappel/Stellar Songs/Sony/ATV/EMI Music Publishing Scandinavia
Vocals by：Noonie Bao
Background Vocals by：Noonie Bao
Co-Producer：Fredrik Borch Olsen
Mixing Engineer：S?ren Von Malmborg
Mastering Engineer：S?ren Von Malmborg
Recorded at：MER Studio in Oslo, Studio City Sound in Los Angeles, Norway
Repertoire Owner：MER Recordings (Swedish Deal)
Lost in your mind
迷失于你的心底  
I wanna know
我想知道  
Am I losing my mind
是否我已失去理智？  
Never let me go
请不要让我离去  
If this night is not forever
如果今夜不是永远  
At least we are together
至少我有你相伴  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
Anywhere whenever
无论何时 无论何地  
Apart but still together
即便天涯海角 我们依然携手相伴  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
Unconscious mind
心像是失去意识  
I'm wide awake
我已全然醒来  
Wanna feel one last time
只想最后一次感受你  
Take my pain away
抚慰我所有的伤痛  
If this night is not forever
如果今夜不是永远  
At least we are together
至少我有你相伴  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
Anywhere whenever
无论何时 无论何地  
Apart but still together
即便天涯海角 我们依然携手相伴  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
I know I'm not alone
我知道我并不孤独  
I'm not alone
我并不孤独  
I'm not alone
我并不孤独  
I'm not alone
我并不孤独

我知道我并不孤独

我并不孤独
